idea: Today, integration is the name of the game in every field. KitesUnited Integrated Marketing Communications (KitesUnited IMC for short) is a new-age company that seeks to create value through Big Ideas that connect business and markets with a winning Integration of Technology and Media. Our team at KitesUnited IMC has a vast experience in crafting 360 degree integrated solutions for brands, both internationally and in India. Our services include Brand Logo and Identity Design, TV Commercials, Print Campaigns, Below-the-line Activation, Direct-to-consumer, especially Social Media Campaigns, Digital Video Creation, Website Design & Online Content, Packaging Design, Event Concepts, Public Relations, as well as cutting-edge brand activities like Augmented and Virtual Reality.
name: KAY IMAGERY AND TEXT EXPERT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

name: SimplifyO

idea:
A little revolution now and then is a good thing. How we live, what we buy and what we throw away has ripple effects on the world around us. Therefore, we are dedicated to eco-friendly and biodegradable alternatives you just can’t wait to put in your home.

For the past few years, we’ve been a company with strong beliefs about the rights of people and planet. We believe that a company's values are as important as the products it makes. We know that plant-based products can provide the efficacy you are looking for, and that products designed from compostable plant-based ingredients are a more sustainable option than ingredients made from plastic. We believe that waste, is well... a waste. It's why we offer end to end sustainability – from raw material sourcing to manufacturing processes to packaging to delivery to disposal of the used product. 

We have a lot of beliefs, but the biggest one is doing things right, being trustworthy, positive and straightforward.

We invite you on our journey to nurture simplicity, spirituality and purity. What do you believe?
name: BECO

idea:
WHealthyfy HealthTech is building an Open Digital Healthcare Platform that will form the core backbone of the entire healthcare network across the country and the world. This platform will allow for all stakeholders to connect digitally and offer services to consumers through a simple and easy to use mobile app.

Along with the platform WHealthyfy is also offering services in the domain of healthcare that will generate a million indirect jobs and help connect all the doctors on a network that will generate avenues for additional revenue and enable reach to offer affordable and quality healthcare solutions. WHealthyfy has already partnered with certain key stakeholders to build a complete ecosystem of Platform+Services in offering Total Affordable Quality Healthcare a reality
name: WHEALTHYFY HEALTHTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
